name: Rummage Pre-Alpha Demo
description:
In this game you play as a scavenger robot named J.D. and explore a vast, war-torn world to try and rebuild the ship of an unknown, crash-landed species

Once you give the game a try, we would really appreciate your feedback! Even the tiniest bit helps!

https://forms.gle/3nbXGTrMhpTKro3G9
